item.title: 肯尼亚通胀率为 3.3%，更有理由再次降息
item.description: 肯尼亚 1 月份的通货膨胀率连续第八个月低于央行目标区间 5%的中点，这为央行下周降息提供了空间。【原文：Kenya’s inflation rate remained below the 5% midpoint of the central bank’s target range for an eighth straight month in January, providing scope for the central bank to cut interest rates next week.】

item.title: 法国通胀率意外保持稳定，低于欧洲央行 2% 的目标
item.description: 年初，法国通胀率出人意料地保持稳定，仍低于欧洲央行 2% 的目标，验证了决策者逐步降息的计划。【原文：French inflation unexpectedly held steady at the start of the year, remaining below the European Central Bank’s 2% target and validating policymakers’ plans to gradually cut interest rates.】

item.title: 印度预测经济增长 6.3%-6.8%，前景 "均衡
item.description: 印度政府预测，下一财年印度经济将增长 6.3%-6.8%，增速较近期有所放缓，低于总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）实现其宏伟目标所需的水平。【原文：India’s government predicted the economy will expand 6.3%-6.8% in the coming fiscal year, a more moderate pace than the recent past and below the levels needed for Prime Minister Narendra Modi to meet his ambitious goals.】

item.title: 欧尔班再次威胁就天然气过境问题否决对俄罗斯的制裁
item.description: 匈牙利总理维克托-欧尔班（Viktor Orban）再次威胁说，如果乌克兰届时不能恢复俄罗斯天然气的过境运输，欧盟将在六个月后延长对俄罗斯的制裁时否决制裁。【原文：Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban again threatened to veto European Union sanctions against Russia when they come due for renewal in six months’ time if Ukraine fails to resume the transit of Russian gas by then.】

item.title: 亿万富翁卡斯特尔的吉尼斯交易显示继承权正在形成
item.description: 卡斯特集团（Castel Group）收购吉尼斯（Guinness）西非业务的交易是一个明确的信号，表明法国亿万富翁皮埃尔-卡斯特（Pierre Castel）这个家族控制的神秘企业集团正在进行接班。【原文：Castel Group’s deal to buy a Guinness operation in West Africa is a clear signal that succession is taking hold within French billionaire Pierre Castel’s secretive, family-controlled conglomerate.】

item.title: Orsted 首席执行官在未能扭转风电公司局面后下台
item.description: 丹麦风能开发商 Orsted A/S 在过去几年中进行了一系列重大减值，Mads Nipper 将辞去该公司首席执行官一职。【原文：Mads Nipper will step down as chief executive officer of Danish wind developer Orsted A/S after a series of significant writedowns over the past few years.】

item.title: 劳动力危机加剧，日本外籍劳动力创历史新高
item.description: 在日本的外籍劳工人数创下新高，凸显出日本越来越依赖海外人才来解决长期的劳动力短缺问题。【原文：The number of foreign workers in Japan reached a new high, underscoring the country’s growing reliance on people from overseas to address its chronic labor shortage.】

item.title: 科威特任命迪拜新石油贸易公司首席执行官和首席财务官
item.description: 科威特石油公司（Kuwait Petroleum Corp. ）的石油贸易部门任命公司资深人士阿卜杜拉蒂夫-阿尔穆海泽姆（Abdullatif Almukhaizeem）为首席执行官，使该部门更接近于开始运营，而此时海湾地区的一些国营巨头正在该行业进行扩张。【原文：Kuwait Petroleum Corp.’s oil trading unit appointed company veteran Abdullatif Almukhaizeem as chief executive officer, taking the division closer to starting operations just as a clutch of Gulf state-run majors are expanding in the industry.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国房价增长放缓幅度超出预期
日本央行上田表示有信心向市场传递加息信息
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫表示，金融市场已明确接收到日本央行逐步加息的信息，并补充说，如果经济前景得以实现，将进行更多加息。【原文：The Bank of Japan’s message on gradual interest hikes has been clearly received by financial markets, Governor Kazuo Ueda said, adding that more hikes will take place if its economic outlook is realized.】

item.title: 高盛称大宗商品闪现美国关税风险，特朗普步步紧逼
item.description: 据高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Commodity markets are pricing in elevated odds that US President Donald Trump’s sanctions against Canadian imports will include raw materials like oil, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc., which warned of higher gasoline prices in the Midwest if penalties cover crude flows.】

item.title: 预算案发布前，莫迪请财富女神保佑中产阶级
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）周五援引印度教财富女神来提升印度穷人和中产阶级的地位，这可能预示着印度政府可能会在第二天公布的预算案中出台措施来拉动下行的消费。【原文：Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Friday invoked the Hindu goddess of wealth to elevate India’s poor and the middle-class, a possible sign the government may introduce measures to lift sagging consumption in the budget due the next day.】

item.title: DeepSeek 和 Ozempic 正在使去碳化预测变得复杂
item.description:
一位清洁能源专家关于绿色转型趋势的年度幻灯片为下一次大震荡做好准备。【原文：

One clean energy expert’s annual slide deck on green transition trends prepares us for the next big shocks.

】

item.title: 菲律宾基准股指从 10 月高点下滑 20
item.description: 由于对令人失望的经济增长和不断上升的全球不利因素的担忧，菲律宾股市下跌，使该国基准指数步入熊市。【原文：Philippine stocks dropped, putting the the nation’s benchmark index on course for a bear market, amid concern over disappointing economic growth and rising global headwinds.】

item.title: 受丑闻影响，富士媒体股价下跌，债券利差扩大
item.description: 富士媒体控股公司（Fuji Media Holdings Inc.【原文：Fuji Media Holdings Inc. shares slipped and the spread on its bonds has widened as the impact of a sexual harassment scandal continues to hurt the Japanese television broadcaster.】

item.title: 帝亚吉欧东非公司上半年利润三年来首次增长
item.description: 由于该地区平均生活成本下降，东非啤酒公司上半年利润三年来首次攀升。【原文：East African Breweries Plc’s first-half profit climbed for the first time in three years as the average cost of living in the region decreased.】

item.title: 土耳其债券将迎来一年多来最佳月度涨势
item.description: 通胀放缓和政策宽松的前景正吸引大量投资流向土耳其债券市场，使较长期限的债券有望创下近两年来的最佳月度表现。【原文：Slowing inflation and policy-easing prospects are luring bumper investment flows to Turkey’s bond markets, putting longer-dated debt on track for the best monthly showing in almost two years.】

item.title: 供应链支柱 JSR 发现 DeepSeek 促进了芯片销售
item.description: 用于制造半导体的光刻胶的领先供应商 JSR 公司认为，DeepSeek 的低成本人工智能模型的到来为该行业带来了福音。【原文：JSR Corp., the leading supplier of photoresists used to make semiconductors, sees the arrival of DeepSeek’s low-cost artificial intelligence model as a boon to the industry.】

item.title: 六场风暴肆虐，澳大利亚准备应对危及生命的洪灾
item.description: 澳大利亚及其属地周围的六个风暴预计将在未来几天内加强，其中一个系统可能会在该国北部引发危及生命的洪水，另外三个系统至少有中等几率在下周一之前形成热带气旋。【原文：Six storms around Australia and its territories are expected to strengthen in the coming days, with one system likely to trigger life-threatening flooding in the nation’s north and three others with at least a moderate chance to form into tropical cyclones by Monday.】

item.title: 诺和诺德股价从 40% 的暴跌中回升的道路依然漫长
item.description: 诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）上周公布了一种实验性减肥药的试验结果，为投资者带来了急需的提振。但要挽回过去六个月的跌势，还有很长的路要走。【原文：Novo Nordisk A/S investors got a much-needed boost from last week’s trial results for an experimental weight-loss shot. But there’s still a long way to go to claw back the declines of the past six months.】

item.title: 研究发现：女性不信任英格兰银行的通胀能力
item.description: 新的研究显示，女性对英格兰银行的信任度低于男性，而且更容易受到生活成本冲击的影响，这凸显了央行在提高公众声誉方面所面临的挑战。【原文：Women trust the Bank of England less than men and feel more squeezed by cost-of-living shocks, new research shows, underlining the challenge facing the central bank to improve its public reputation.】

item.title: 监管机构调查英国数据危机的蔓延程度
item.description: 监管机构正在调查英国是否有更多的官方经济统计数据受到了类似于劳动力市场关键数据陷入混乱的问题的影响。【原文：Regulators are investigating whether more of the UK’s official economic statistics have been hit by problems similar to those that plunged crucial labor market data into chaos.】

item.title: 部长称特朗普的绿色撤退为巴西带来机遇
item.description: 巴西财政部长费尔南多-哈达德（Fernando Haddad）表示，唐纳德-特朗普总统缩减美国可再生能源投资的举动正促使企业将巴西作为这些项目的替代选择。【原文：President Donald Trump’s move to scale back US investments in renewable energy is spurring companies to look to Brazil as an alternative for those projects, according to Finance Minister Fernando Haddad.】

item.title: 房价飙升，2024 年曼谷新房上市量减少 19
item.description: 据一位行业顾问称，去年泰国首都新推出的住房项目减少了 19%，原因是房价飙升，开发商更加专注于建造昂贵的房产。【原文：New housing project launches in the Thai capital fell 19% last year as prices surged and developers focused more on building expensive properties, according to an industry consultant.】

item.title: 如果特朗普对中国加征关税，日本担心再遭重创
item.description: 日本政府首席经济学家表示，如果美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对中国征收新的关税，引发新一轮中美贸易战，日本经济将面临再次遭受打击的风险。【原文：Japan’s economy risks taking another hit if US President Donald Trump slaps fresh tariffs on China, sparking a renewed US-China trade war, according the government’s chief economist.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行下月降息，四年来首次放宽政策
item.description: 接受彭博社调查的大多数经济学家认为，澳大利亚央行将于下月开始降息，这将是澳大利亚央行四年多来首次放松货币政策。【原文：Australia’s central bank will embark on interest-rate cuts next month, according to a majority of economists polled by Bloomberg, in what would be its first monetary easing in more than four years.】

item.title: 石破称日本将向特朗普寻求稳定的能源供应
item.description: 日本首相石破茂表示，他将在与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普会晤时要求美国提供稳定的能源供应，这暗示了日本领导人在即将举行的会谈中可能试图与特朗普达成的交易。【原文：Japan’s Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba said he would ask US President Donald Trump for a stable supply of energy when they meet, hinting at the deals that the Japanese leader may try to strike with Trump in upcoming talks.】

item.title: 受制裁船只经过长途跋涉在中国卸载俄罗斯石油
item.description: 本月被美国制裁的一艘油轮在中国卸下了俄罗斯石油，这艘油轮经过了一段异常漫长的旅程，目的地从独立炼油厂的集散地山东省变为了中国。【原文：A tanker sanctioned by the US this month has discharged Russian oil in China after an unusually long journey in which it changed its destination from Shandong province, a hub for independent refiners.】

item.title: 季节性因素可能左右预算案后的印度股市走势
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 大和因交易和投资银行业务盈利超出预期
item.description: 大和证券集团公司（Daiwa Securities Group Inc.【原文：Daiwa Securities Group Inc.’s profit rose more than analysts expected last quarter, as Japan’s second-largest brokerage joined Wall Street titans in posting higher income from trading and investment banking.】
